seniority_level.evidence: 5-6 years of experience aligns with mid-level expectations. Title is Data Engineer without 'Senior' prefix.

job_family.evidence: Job title is Data Engineer and responsibilities center around data pipelines and ETL.

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on ETL processes, data pipelines, and data lakes suggests a batch-oriented role.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team management or direct reports. Focus is on individual contribution to data engineering tasks.

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Azure, and GCP are all explicitly mentioned as supported platforms.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud is prioritized over others.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both real-time data processing and batch data processing.

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both cloud-native data storage solutions (S3, Blob Storage, BigQuery, Redshift) and data lakes.

remote_restriction.evidence: No explicit remote work restrictions are stated.

timezone_focus.evidence: No specific timezone or region is mentioned.

relocation_required.evidence: The job posting does not mention any relocation requirements.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: The job posting states 'full-time' and 'permanent' employment, suggesting a W2 position.

benefits_level.evidence: No specific benefits are mentioned in the job description.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions assisting with data platform blueprint and design, suggesting potential for growth.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with Integration Architects and Data Architects suggests learning from experienced professionals.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Focus on individual contribution and technical skills suggests an IC track.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A mix of 'must have' (Databricks, PySpark) and 'good to have' skills.

scope_definition.evidence: The job description focuses specifically on data engineering tasks.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: The required skills are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer.
